content: Is there a plan for a standard conformance test (using Touchstone?) for the Plan-Net IG Conformance?
@Saul Kravitz - Have you worked with @Carie Hammond to develop more test-scripts?

I can see that several people have been testing the PlanNet scripts over the last few days. We got asked to make a change to the 'history' asserts, which is being worked on now. We are open to additional functionality tests - please feel free to contact me at carie.hammond@aegis.net.
